text: For all those of you who were given baptism into Christ did put on Christ.

title: Galatians Chapter 3 Verse 28
text: There is no Jew or Greek, servant or free, male or female: because you are all one in Jesus Christ.

title: Galatians Chapter 3 Verse 29
text: And if you are Christ's, then you are Abraham's seed, and yours is the heritage by the right of God's undertaking given to Abraham.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 1
text: But I say that as long as the son is a child, he is in no way different from a servant, though he is lord of all;

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 2
text: But is under keepers and managers till the time fixed by the father.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 3
text: So we, when we were young, were kept under the first rules of the world;

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 4
text: But when the time had come, God sent out his Son, made of a woman, made under the law,

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 5
text: That he might make them free who were under the law, and that we might be given the place of sons.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 6
text: And because you are sons, God has sent out the Spirit of his Son into our hearts, saying, Abba, Father.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 7
text: So that you are no longer a servant, but a son; and if a son, then the heritage of God is yours.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 8
text: But at that time, having no knowledge of God, you were servants to those who by right are no gods:

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 9
text: But now that you have come to have knowledge of God, or more truly, God has knowledge of you, how is it that you go back again to the poor and feeble first things, desiring to be servants to them again?

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 10
text: You keep days, and months, and fixed times, and years.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 11
text: I am in fear of you, that I may have been working for you to no purpose.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 12
text: My desire for you, brothers, is that you may be as I am, because I am as you are. You have done me no wrong;

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 13
text: But you have knowledge that with a feeble body I was preaching the good news to you the first time;

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 14
text: And you did not have a poor opinion of me because of the trouble in my flesh, or put shame on it; but you took me to your hearts as an angel of God, even as Christ Jesus.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 15
text: Where then is that happy condition of yours? because I give you witness, that, if possible, you would have taken out your eyes and given them to me.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 16
text: So then am I no longer your friend, because I give you true words?

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 17
text: Their interest in you is not good; but their desire is that you may be shut out, so that you may go after them.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 18
text: But it is good to have an interest in a good cause at all times, and not only when I am present with you.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 19
text: My children, of whom I am again in birth-pains till Christ is formed in you,

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 20
text: Truly my desire is to be present with you now, using a changed voice; for I am troubled about you.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 21
text: Say, you whose desire it is to be under the law, do you not give ear to the law?

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 22
text: Because it is in the Writings, that Abraham had two sons, one by the servant-woman, and one by the free woman.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 23
text: Now the son by the servant-woman has his birth after the flesh; but the son by the free woman has his birth through the undertaking of God.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 24
text: Which things have a secret sense; because these women are the two agreements; one from the mountain of Sinai, giving birth to servants, which is Hagar.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 25
text: Now this Hagar is the mountain Sinai in Arabia, and is the image of the Jerusalem which now is: which is a servant with her children.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 26
text: But the Jerusalem on high is free, which is our mother.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 27
text: For it is in the Writings, You who have never given birth, be glad; give cries of joy, you who have had no birth-pains; for the children of her who has been given up by her husband are more than those of the woman who has a husband.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 28
text: Now we, brothers, as Isaac was, are the children of the undertaking of God.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 29
text: But as in those days he who had birth after the flesh was cruel to him who had birth after the Spirit, even so it is now.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 30
text: What then do the Writings say? Send away the servant-woman and her son; for the son of the servant-woman will not have a part in the heritage with the son of the free woman.

title: Galatians Chapter 4 Verse 31
text: So, brothers, we are not children of the servant-woman, but of the free woman.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 1
text: Christ has truly made us free: then keep your free condition and let no man put a yoke on you again.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 2
text: See, I Paul say to you, that if you undergo circumcision, Christ will be of no use to you.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 3
text: Yes, I give witness again to every man who undergoes circumcision, that he will have to keep all the law.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 4
text: You are cut off from Christ, you who would have righteousness by the law; you are turned away from grace.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 5
text: For we through the Spirit by faith are waiting for the hope of righteousness.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 6
text: Because in Christ Jesus, having circumcision or not having circumcision are equally of no profit; but only faith working through love.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 7
text: You were going on well; who was the cause of your not giving ear to what is true?

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 8
text: This ready belief did not come from him who had made you his.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 9
text: A little leaven makes a change in all the mass.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 10
text: I am certain about you in the Lord, that you will be of no other mind; but he who is troubling you will have his punishment, whoever he is.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 11
text: But I, brothers, if I am still preaching circumcision, why am I still attacked? then has the shame of the cross been taken away.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 12
text: My desire is that they who give you trouble might even be cut off themselves.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 13
text: Because you, brothers, were marked out to be free; only do not make use of your free condition to give the flesh its chance, but through love be servants one to another.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 14
text: For all the law is made complete in one word, even in this, Have love for your neighbour as for yourself.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 15
text: But if you are given to fighting with one another, take care that you are not the cause of destruction one to another.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 16
text: But I say, Go on in the Spirit, and you will not come under the rule of the evil desires of the flesh.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 17
text: For the flesh has desires against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh; because these are opposite the one to the other; so that you may not do the things which you have a mind to do.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 18
text: But if you are guided by the Spirit, you are not under the law.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 19
text: Now the works of the flesh are clear, which are these: evil desire, unclean things, wrong use of the senses,

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 20
text: Worship of images, use of strange powers, hates, fighting, desire for what another has, angry feelings, attempts to get the better of others, divisions, false teachings,

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 21
text: Envy, uncontrolled drinking and feasting, and such things: of which I give you word clearly, even as I did in the past, that they who do such things will have no part in the kingdom of God.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 22
text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, a quiet mind, kind acts, well-doing, faith,

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 23
text: Gentle behaviour, control over desires: against such there is no law.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 24
text: And those who are Christ's have put to death on the cross the flesh with its passions and its evil desires.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 25
text: If we are living by the Spirit, by the Spirit let us be guided.

title: Galatians Chapter 5 Verse 26
text: Let us not be full of self-glory, making one another angry, having envy of one another.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 1
text: Brothers, if a man is taken in any wrongdoing, you who are of the Spirit will put such a one right in a spirit of love; keeping watch on yourself, for fear that you yourself may be tested.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 2
text: Take on yourselves one another's troubles, and so keep the law of Christ.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 3
text: For if a man has an idea that he is something when he is nothing, he is tricked by himself.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 4
text: But let every man make test of his work, and then will his cause for glory be in himself only, and not in his neighbour.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 5
text: Because every man is responsible for his part of the work.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 6
text: But let him who gets teaching in the word give a part in all good things to his teacher.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 7
text: Be not tricked; God is not made sport of: for whatever seed a man puts in, that will he get back as grain.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 8
text: Because he who puts in the seed of the flesh will of the flesh get the reward of death; but he who puts in the seed of the Spirit will of the Spirit get the reward of eternal life.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 9
text: And let us not get tired of well-doing; for at the right time we will get in the grain, if we do not give way to weariness.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 10
text: So then, as we have the chance, let us do good to all men, and specially to those who are of the family of the faith.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 11
text: See the size of the handwriting which I myself have made use of in writing to you.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 12
text: Those who have the desire to seem important in the flesh, put force on you to undergo circumcision; only that they may not be attacked because of the cross of Christ.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 13
text: Because even those who undergo circumcision do not themselves keep the law; but they would have you undergo circumcision, so that they may have glory in your flesh.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 14
text: But far be it from me to have glory in anything, but only in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, through which this world has come to an end on the cross for me, and I for it.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 15
text: For having circumcision is nothing, and not having circumcision is nothing, but only a new order of existence.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 16
text: And on all who are guided by this rule be peace and mercy, and on the Israel of God.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 17
text: From this time on let no man be a trouble to me; because my body is marked with the marks of Jesus.

title: Galatians Chapter 6 Verse 18
text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit, brothers. So be it.

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 1
text: Paul, an Apostle of Christ Jesus by the purpose of God, to the saints who are at Ephesus, and those who have faith in Christ Jesus:

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 2
text: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 3
text: Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has given us every blessing of the Spirit in the heavens in Christ:

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 4
text: Even as he made selection of us in him from the first, so that we might be holy and free from all evil before him in love:

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 5
text: As we were designed before by him for the position of sons to himself, through Jesus Christ, in the good pleasure of his purpose,

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 6
text: To the praise of the glory of his grace, which he freely gave to us in the Loved One:

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 7
text: In whom we have salvation through his blood, the forgiveness of our sins, through the wealth of his grace,

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 8
text: Which he gave us in full measure in all wisdom and care;

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 9
text: Having made clear to us the secret of his purpose, in agreement with the design which he had in mind, to put into his hands

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 10
text: The ordering of the times when they are complete, so that all things might come to a head in Christ, the things in heaven and the things on the earth; in him, I say,

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 11
text: In whom we have a heritage, being marked out from the first in his purpose who does all things in agreement with his designs;

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 12
text: So that his glory might have praise through us who first had hope in Christ:

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 13
text: In whom you, having been given the true word, the good news of your salvation, and through your faith in him, were given the sign of the Holy Spirit of hope,

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 14
text: Which is the first-fruit of our heritage, till God gets back that which is his, to the praise of his glory.

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 15
text: For this cause I, having had news of the faith in the Lord Jesus which is among you, and which you make clear to all the saints,

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 16
text: Give praise without end for you, keeping you in mind in my prayers;

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 17
text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give to you a spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him;

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 18
text: And that having the eyes of your heart full of light, you may have knowledge of what is the hope of his purpose, what is the wealth of the glory of his heritage in the saints,

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 19
text: And how unlimited is his power to us who have faith, as is seen in the working of the strength of his power,

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 20
text: By which he made Christ come back from the dead, and gave him a place at his right hand in heaven,

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 21
text: Far over all rule and authority and power and every name which is named, not only in the present order, but in that which is to come:

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 22
text: And he has put all things under his feet, and has made him to be head over all things to the church,

title: Ephesians Chapter 1 Verse 23
text: Which is his body, the full measure of him in whom all things are made complete.

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 1
text: And to you did he give life, when you were dead through your wrongdoing and sins,

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 2
text: In which you were living in the past, after the ways of this present world, doing the pleasure of the lord of the power of the air, the spirit who is now working in those who go against the purpose of God;

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 3
text: Among whom we all at one time were living in the pleasures of our flesh, giving way to the desires of the flesh and of the mind, and the punishment of God was waiting for us even as for the rest.

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 4
text: But God, being full of mercy, through the great love which he had for us,

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 5
text: Even when we were dead through our sins, gave us life together with Christ (by grace you have salvation),

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 6
text: So that we came back from death with him, and are seated with him in the heavens, in Christ Jesus;

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 7
text: That in the time to come he might make clear the full wealth of his grace in his mercy to us in Christ Jesus:

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 8
text: Because by grace you have salvation through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is given by God:

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 9
text: Not by works, so that no man may take glory to himself.

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 10
text: For by his act we were given existence in Christ Jesus to do those good works which God before made ready for us so that we might do them.

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 11
text: For this reason keep it in mind that in the past you, the Gentiles in the flesh, who are looked on as being outside the circumcision by those who have circumcision, in the flesh, made by hands;

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 12
text: That you were at that time without Christ, being cut off from any part in Israel's rights as a nation, having no part in God's agreement, having no hope, and without God in the world.

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 13
text: But now in Christ Jesus you who at one time were far off are made near in the blood of Christ.

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 14
text: For he is our peace, who has made the two into one, and by whom the middle wall of division has been broken down,

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 15
text: Having in his flesh put an end to that which made the division between us, even the law with its rules and orders, so that he might make in himself, of the two, one new man, so making peace;

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 16
text: And that the two might come into agreement with God in one body through the cross, so putting an end to that division.

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 17
text: And he came preaching peace to you who were far off, and to those who were near;

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 18
text: Because through him the two of us are able to come near in one Spirit to the Father.

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 19
text: So then you are no longer as those who have no part or place in the kingdom of God, but you are numbered among the saints, and of the family of God,

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 20
text: Resting on the base of the Apostles and prophets, Christ Jesus himself being the chief keystone,

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 21
text: In whom all the building, rightly joined together, comes to be a holy house of God in the Lord;

title: Ephesians Chapter 2 Verse 22
text: In whom you, with the rest, are united together as a living-place of God in the Spirit.

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 1
text: For this cause I Paul, the prisoner of Christ Jesus for you Gentiles,

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 2
text: If that ordering of the grace of God has come to your knowledge, which was given to me for you,

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 3
text: How by revelation the secret was made clear to me, as I said before in a short letter,

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 4
text: By the reading of which you will be clear about my knowledge of the secret of Christ;

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 5
text: Which in other generations was not given to the sons of men, but the revelation of it has now been made to his holy Apostles and prophets in the Spirit;

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 6
text: Which is that the Gentiles have a part in the heritage, and in the same body, and in the same hope in Christ through the good news,

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 7
text: Of which I was made a preacher, through that grace of God which was given to me in the measure of the working of his power.

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 8
text: To me, who am less than the least of all the saints, was this grace given, so that I might make clear to the Gentiles the good news of the unending wealth of Christ:

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 9
text: And make all men see what is the ordering of the secret which from the first has been kept in God who made all things;

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 10
text: So that now to the rulers and the authorities in the heavens might be made clear through the church the wide-shining wisdom of God,

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 11
text: Which is seen in his eternal purpose in Christ Jesus our Lord:

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 12
text: By whom we come near to God without fear through faith in him.

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 13
text: For this reason it is my prayer that you may not become feeble because of my troubles for you, which are your glory.

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 14
text: For this cause I go down on my knees before the Father,

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 15
text: From whom every family in heaven and on earth is named,

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 16
text: That in the wealth of his glory he would make you strong with power through his Spirit in your hearts;

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 17
text: So that Christ may have his place in your hearts through faith; and that you, being rooted and based in love,

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 18
text: May have strength to see with all the saints how wide and long and high and deep it is,

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 19
text: And to have knowledge of the love of Christ which is outside all knowledge, so that you may be made complete as God himself is complete.

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 20
text: Now to him who is able to do in full measure more than all our desires or thoughts, through the power which is working in us,

title: Ephesians Chapter 3 Verse 21
text: To him be the glory in the church and in Christ Jesus to all generations for ever and ever. So be it.

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 1
text: I then, the prisoner in the Lord, make this request from my heart, that you will see that your behaviour is a credit to the position which God's purpose has given you,

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 2
text: With all gentle and quiet behaviour, taking whatever comes, putting up with one another in love;

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 3
text: Taking care to keep the harmony of the Spirit in the yoke of peace.

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 4
text: There is one body and one Spirit, even as you have been marked out by God in the one hope of his purpose for you;

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 5
text: One Lord, one faith, one baptism,

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 6
text: One God and Father of all, who is over all, and through all, and in all.

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 7
text: But to every one of us has grace been given in the measure of the giving of Christ.

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 8
text: For this reason he says, He went up on high, taking his prisoners with him, and gave freely to men.

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 9
text: (Now this, He went up, what is it but that he first went down into the lower parts of the earth?

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 10
text: He who went down is the same who went up far over all the heavens so that he might make all things complete.)

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 11
text: And he gave some as Apostles, and some, prophets; and some, preachers of the good news; and some to give care and teaching;

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 12
text: For the training of the saints as servants in the church, for the building up of the body of Christ:

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 13
text: Till we all come to the harmony of the faith, and of the knowledge of the Son of God, to full growth, to the full measure of Christ:

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 14
text: So that we may be no longer children, sent this way and that, turned about by every wind of teaching, by the twisting and tricks of men, by the deceits of error;

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 15
text: But saying true words in love, may come to full growth in him, who is the head, even Christ;

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 16
text: Through whom all the body, being rightly formed and united together, by the full working of every part, is increased to the building up of itself in love.

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 17
text: This I say, then, and give witness in the Lord, that you are to go no longer in the way of the Gentiles whose minds are turned to that which has no profit,

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 18
text: Whose thoughts are dark, to whom the life of God is strange because they are without knowledge, and their hearts have been made hard;

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 19
text: Who having no more power of feeling, have given themselves up to evil passions, to do all unclean things with overmuch desire.

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 20
text: For this was not the teaching of Christ which was given to you;

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 21
text: If in fact you gave ear to him, and were given teaching in him, even as what is true is made clear in Jesus:

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 22
text: That you are to put away, in relation to your earlier way of life, the old man, which has become evil by love of deceit;

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 23
text: And be made new in the spirit of your mind,

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 24
text: And put on the new man, to which God has given life, in righteousness and a true and holy way of living.

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 25
text: And so, putting away false words, let everyone say what is true to his neighbour: for we are parts one of another.

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 26
text: Be angry without doing wrong; let not the sun go down on your wrath;

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 27
text: And do not give way to the Evil One.

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 28
text: Let him who was a thief be so no longer, but let him do good work with his hands, so that he may have something to give to him who is in need.

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 29
text: Let no evil talk come out of your mouth, but only what is good for giving necessary teaching, and for grace to those who give ear.

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 30
text: And do not give grief to the Holy Spirit of God, by whom you were marked for the day of salvation.

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 31
text: Let all bitter, sharp and angry feeling, and noise, and evil words, be put away from you, with all unkind acts;

title: Ephesians Chapter 4 Verse 32
text: And be kind to one another, full of pity, having forgiveness for one another, even as God in Christ had forgiveness for you.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 1
text: Let it then be your desire to be like God, as well-loved children;

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 2
text: And be living in love, even as Christ had love for you, and gave himself up for us, an offering to God for a perfume of a sweet smell.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 3
text: But evil acts of the flesh and all unclean things, or desire for others' property, let it not even be named among you, as is right for saints;

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 4
text: And let there be no low behaviour, or foolish talk, or words said in sport, which are not right, but in place of them the giving of praise.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 5
text: Being certain of this, that no man who gives way to the passions of the flesh, no unclean person, or one who has desire for the property of others, or who gives worship to images, has any heritage in the kingdom of Christ and God.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 6
text: Do not be turned from the right way by foolish words; for because of these things the punishment of God comes on those who do not put themselves under him.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 7
text: Have no part with such men;

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 8
text: For you at one time were dark, but now are light in the Lord: let your behaviour be that of children of light

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 9
text: (Because the fruit of the light is in all righteousness and in everything which is good and true),

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 10
text: Testing by experience what is well-pleasing to the Lord;

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 11
text: And have no company with the works of the dark, which give no fruit, but make their true quality clear;

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 12
text: For the things which are done by them in secret it is shame even to put into words.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 13
text: But all things, when their true quality is seen, are made clear by the light: because everything which is made clear is light.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 14
text: For this reason he says, Be awake, you who are sleeping, and come up from among the dead, and Christ will be your light.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 15
text: Take care then how you are living, not as unwise, but as wise;

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 16
text: Making good use of the time, because the days are evil.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 17
text: For this reason, then, do not be foolish, but be conscious of the Lord's pleasure.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 18
text: And do not take overmuch wine by which one may be overcome, but be full of the Spirit;

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 19
text: Joining with one another in holy songs of praise and of the Spirit, using your voice in songs and making melody in your heart to the Lord;

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 20
text: Giving praise at all times for all things in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, to God, even the Father;

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 21
text: Letting yourselves be ruled by one another in the fear of Christ.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 22
text: Wives, be under the authority of your husbands, as of the Lord.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 23
text: For the husband is the head of the wife, as Christ is the head of the church, being himself the saviour of the body.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 24
text: And as the church is under Christ's authority, so let wives be under the rule of their husbands in all things.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 25
text: Husbands, have love for your wives, even as Christ had love for the church, and gave himself for it;

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 26
text: So that he might make it holy, having made it clean with the washing of water by the word,

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 27
text: And might take it for himself, a church full of glory, not having one mark or fold or any such thing; but that it might be holy and complete.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 28
text: Even so it is right for husbands to have love for their wives as for their bodies. He who has love for his wife has love for himself:

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 29
text: For no man ever had hate for his flesh; but he gives it food and takes care of it, even as Christ does for the church;

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 30
text: Because we are parts of his body.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 31
text: For this cause will a man go away from his father and mother and be joined to his wife, and the two will become one flesh.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 32
text: This is a great secret: but my words are about Christ and the church.

title: Ephesians Chapter 5 Verse 33
text: But do you, everyone, have love for his wife, even as for himself; and let the wife see that she has respect for her husband.

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 1
text: Children, do what is ordered by your fathers and mothers in the Lord: for this is right.

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 2
text: Give honour to your father and mother (which is the first rule having a reward),

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 3
text: So that all may be well for you, and your life may be long on the earth.

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 4
text: And, you fathers, do not make your children angry: but give them training in the teaching and fear of the Lord.

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 5
text: Servants, do what is ordered by those who are your natural masters, having respect and fear for them, with all your heart, as to Christ;

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 6
text: Not only under your master's eye, as pleasers of men; but as servants of Christ, doing the pleasure of God from the heart;

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 7
text: Doing your work readily, as to the Lord, and not to men:

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 8
text: In the knowledge that for every good thing anyone does, he will have his reward from the Lord, If he is a servant or if he is free.

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 9
text: And, you masters, do the same things to them, not making use of violent words: in the knowledge that their Master and yours is in heaven, and he has no respect for a man's position.

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 10
text: Lastly, be strong in the Lord, and in the strength of his power.

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 11
text: Take up God's instruments of war, so that you may be able to keep your position against all the deceits of the Evil One.

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 12
text: For our fight is not against flesh and blood, but against authorities and powers, against the world-rulers of this dark night, against the spirits of evil in the heavens.

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 13
text: For this reason take up all the arms of God, so that you may be able to be strong in the evil day, and, having done all, to keep your place.

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 14
text: Take your place, then, having your body clothed with the true word, and having put on the breastplate of righteousness;

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 15
text: Be ready with the good news of peace as shoes on your feet;

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 16
text: And most of all, using faith as a cover to keep off all the flaming arrows of the Evil One.

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 17
text: And take salvation for your head-dress and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 18
text: With prayers and deep desires, making requests at all times in the Spirit, and keeping watch, with strong purpose, in prayer for all the saints,

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 19
text: And for me, that words may be given to me in the opening of my mouth, to make clear without fear the secret of the good news,

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 20
text: For which I am a representative in chains, and that I may say without fear the things which it is right for me to say.

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 21
text: But so that you may have knowledge of my business, and how I am, Tychicus, the well-loved brother and tested servant in the Lord, will give you news of all things:

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 22
text: Whom I have sent to you for this very purpose, so that you may have knowledge of our position, and that he may give comfort to your hearts.

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 23
text: Peace be to the brothers, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

title: Ephesians Chapter 6 Verse 24
text: Grace be with all those who have true love for our Lord Jesus Christ.

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 1
text: Paul and Timothy, servants of Jesus Christ, to all the saints in Christ Jesus at Philippi, with the Bishops and Deacons of the church:

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 2
text: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 3
text: I give praise to my God at every memory of you,

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 4
text: And in all my prayers for you all, making my request with joy,

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 5
text: Because of your help in giving the good news from the first day till now;

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 6
text: For I am certain of this very thing, that he by whom the good work was started in you will make it complete till the day of Jesus Christ:

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 7
text: So it is right for me to take thought for you all in this way, because I have you in my heart; for in my chains, and in my arguments before the judges in support of the good news, making clear that it is true, you all have your part with me in grace.

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 8
text: For God is my witness, how my love goes out to you all in the loving mercies of Christ Jesus.

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 9
text: And my prayer is that you may be increased more and more in knowledge and experience;

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 10
text: So that you may give your approval to the best things; that you may be true and without wrongdoing till the day of Christ;

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 11
text: Being full of the fruits of righteousness, which are through Jesus Christ, to the glory and praise of God.

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 12
text: Now it is my purpose to make clear to you, brothers, that the cause of the good news has been helped by my experiences;

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 13
text: So that it became clear through all the Praetorium, and to all the rest, that I was a prisoner on account of Christ;

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 14
text: And most of the brothers in the Lord, taking heart because of my chains, are all the stronger to give the word of God without fear.

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 15
text: Though some are preaching Christ out of envy and competition, others do it out of a good heart:

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 16
text: These do it from love, conscious that I am responsible for the cause of the good news:

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 17
text: But those are preaching Christ in a spirit of competition, not from their hearts, but with the purpose of giving me pain in my prison.

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 18
text: What then? only that in every way, falsely or truly, the preaching of Christ goes on; and in this I am glad, and will be glad.

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 19
text: For I am conscious that this will be for my salvation, through your prayer and the giving out of the stored wealth of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 20
text: In the measure of my strong hope and belief that in nothing will I be put to shame, but that without fear, as at all times, so now will Christ have glory in my body, by life or by death.

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 21
text: For to me life is Christ and death is profit.

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 22
text: But if I go on living in the flesh--if this is the fruit of my work--then I do not see what decision to make.

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 23
text: I am in a hard position between the two, having a desire to go away and be with Christ, which is very much better:

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 24
text: Still, to go on in the flesh is more necessary because of you.

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 25
text: And being certain of this, I am conscious that I will go on, yes, and go on with you all, for your growth and joy in the faith;

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 26
text: So that your pride in me may be increased in Christ Jesus through my being present with you again.

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 27
text: Only let your behaviour do credit to the good news of Christ, so that if I come and see you or if I am away from you, I may have news of you that you are strong in one spirit, working together with one soul for the faith of the good news;

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 28
text: Having no fear of those who are against you; which is a clear sign of their destruction, but of your salvation, and that from God;

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 29
text: Because to you it has been given in the cause of Christ not only to have faith in him, but to undergo pain on his account:

title: Philippians Chapter 1 Verse 30
text: Fighting the same fight which you saw in me, and now have word of in me.

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 1
text: If then there is any comfort in Christ, any help given by love, any uniting of hearts in the Spirit, any loving mercies and pity,

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 2
text: Make my joy complete by being of the same mind, having the same love, being in harmony and of one mind;

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 3
text: Doing nothing through envy or through pride, but with low thoughts of self let everyone take others to be better than himself;

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 4
text: Not looking everyone to his private good, but keeping in mind the things of others.

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 5
text: Let this mind be in you which was in Christ Jesus,

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 6
text: To whom, though himself in the form of God, it did not seem that to take for oneself was to be like God;

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 7
text: But he made himself as nothing, taking the form of a servant, being made like men;

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 8
text: And being seen in form as a man, he took the lowest place, and let himself be put to death, even the death of the cross.

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 9
text: For this reason God has put him in the highest place and has given to him the name which is greater than every name;

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 10
text: So that at the name of Jesus every knee may be bent, of those in heaven and those on earth and those in the underworld,

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 11
text: And that every tongue may give witness that Jesus Christ is Lord, to the glory of God the Father.

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 12
text: So then, my loved ones, as you have at all times done what I say, not only when I am present, but now much more when I am not with you, give yourselves to working out your salvation with fear in your hearts;

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 13
text: For it is God who is the cause of your desires and of your acts, for his good pleasure.

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 14
text: Do all things without protests and arguments;

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 15
text: So that you may be holy and gentle, children of God without sin in a twisted and foolish generation, among whom you are seen as lights in the world,

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 16
text: Offering the word of life; so that I may have glory in you in the day of Christ, because my running was not for nothing and my work was not without effect.

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 17
text: And even if I am offered like a drink offering, giving myself for the cause and work of your faith, I am glad and have joy with you all:

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 18
text: And in the same way do you be glad and have a part in my joy.

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 19
text: But I am hoping in the Lord Jesus to send Timothy to you before long, so that I may be comforted when I have news of you.

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 20
text: For I have no man of like mind who will truly have care for you.

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 21
text: For they all go after what is theirs, not after the things of Christ.

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 22
text: But his quality is clear to you; how, as a child is to its father, so he was a help to me in the work of the good news.

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 23
text: Him then I am hoping to send as quickly as possible, when I am able to see how things will go for me:

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 24
text: But I have faith in the Lord that I myself will come before long.

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 25
text: But it seemed to me necessary to send to you Epaphroditus, my brother, who has taken part with me in the work and in the fight, and your servant, sent by you for help in my need;

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 26
text: Because his heart was with you all, and he was greatly troubled because you had news that he was ill:

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 27
text: For in fact he was ill almost to death: but God had mercy on him; and not only on him but on me, so that I might not have grief on grief.

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 28
text: I have sent him, then, the more gladly, so that when you see him again, you may be happy and I may have the less sorrow.

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 29
text: So take him to your hearts in the Lord with all joy, and give honour to such as he is:

title: Philippians Chapter 2 Verse 30
text: Because for the work of Christ he was near to death, putting his life in danger to make your care for me complete.

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 1
text: For the rest, my brothers, be glad in the Lord. Writing the same things to you is no trouble to me, and for you it is safe.

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 2
text: Be on the watch against dogs, against the workers of evil, against those of the circumcision:

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 3
text: For we are the circumcision, who give worship to God and have glory in Jesus Christ, and have no faith in the flesh:

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 4
text: Even though I myself might have faith in the flesh: if any other man has reason to have faith in the flesh, I have more:

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 5
text: Being given circumcision on the eighth day, of the nation of Israel, of the tribe of Benjamin, a Hebrew of Hebrews; in relation to the law, a Pharisee:

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 6
text: In bitter hate I was cruel to the church; I kept all the righteousness of the law to the last detail.

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 7
text: But those things which were profit to me, I gave up for Christ.

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 8
text: Yes truly, and I am ready to give up all things for the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord, which is more than all: for whom I have undergone the loss of all things, and to me they are less than nothing, so that I may have Christ as my reward,

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 9
text: And be seen in him, not having my righteousness which is of the law, but that which is through faith in Christ, the righteousness which is of God by faith:

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 10
text: That I may have knowledge of him, and of the power of his coming back from the dead, and a part with him in his pains, becoming like him in his death;

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 11
text: If in any way I may have the reward of life from the dead.

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 12
text: Not as if I had even now got the reward or been made complete: but I go on in the hope that I may come to the knowledge of that for which I was made the servant of Christ Jesus.

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 13
text: Brothers, it is clear to me that I have not come to that knowledge; but one thing I do, letting go those things which are past, and stretching out to the things which are before,

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 14
text: I go forward to the mark, even the reward of the high purpose of God in Christ Jesus.

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 15
text: Then let us all, who have come to full growth, be of this mind: and if in anything you are of a different mind, even this will God make clear to you:

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 16
text: Only, as far as we have got, let us be guided by the same rule.

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 17
text: Brothers, take me as your example, and take note of those who are walking after the example we have given.

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 18
text: For there are those, of whom I have given you word before, and do so now with sorrow, who are haters of the cross of Christ;

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 19
text: Whose end is destruction, whose god is the stomach, and whose glory is in their shame, whose minds are fixed on the things of the earth.

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 20
text: For our country is in heaven; from where the Saviour for whom we are waiting will come, even the Lord Jesus Christ:

title: Philippians Chapter 3 Verse 21
text: By whom this poor body of ours will be changed into the image of the body of his glory, in the measure of the working by which he is able to put all things under himself.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 1
text: So my brothers, well loved and very dear to me, my joy and crown, be strong in the Lord, my loved ones.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 2
text: I make request to Euodias and Syntyche to be of the same mind in the Lord.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 3
text: And I make request to you, true helper in my work, to see to the needs of those women who took part with me in the good news, with Clement and the rest of my brother-workers whose names are in the book of life.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 4
text: Be glad in the Lord at all times: again I say, Be glad.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 5
text: Let your gentle behaviour be clear to all men. The Lord is near.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 6
text: Have no cares; but in everything with prayer and praise put your requests before God.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 7
text: And the peace of God, which is deeper than all knowledge, will keep your hearts and minds in Christ Jesus.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 8
text: For the rest, my brothers, whatever things are true, whatever things have honour, whatever things are upright, whatever things are holy, whatever things are beautiful, whatever things are of value, if there is any virtue and if there is any praise, give thought to these things.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 9
text: The things which came to you by my teaching and preaching, and which you saw in me, these things do, and the God of peace will be with you.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 10
text: But I am very glad in the Lord that your care for me has come to life again; though you did in fact take thought for me, but you were not able to give effect to it.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 11
text: But I will not say anything about my needs, for I am able, wherever I am, to be dependent on myself.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 12
text: It is the same to me if I am looked down on or honoured; everywhere and in all things I have the secret of how to be full and how to go without food; how to have wealth and how to be in need.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 13
text: I am able to do all things through him who gives me strength.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 14
text: But you did well to have care for me in my need.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 15
text: And you have knowledge, Philippians, that when the good news first came to you, when I went away from Macedonia, no church took part with me in the business of giving to the saints, but you only;

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 16
text: Because even in Thessalonica you sent once and again to me in my need.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 17
text: Not that I am looking for an offering, but for fruit which may be put to your credit.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 18
text: I have all things and more than enough: I am made full, having had from Epaphroditus the things which came from you, a perfume of a sweet smell, an offering well pleasing to God.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 19
text: And my God will give you all you have need of from the wealth of his glory in Christ Jesus.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 20
text: Now to God our Father be glory for ever and ever. So be it.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 21
text: Give words of love to every saint in Christ Jesus. The brothers who are with me send you their love.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 22
text: All the saints send their love to you, specially those who are of Caesar's house.

title: Philippians Chapter 4 Verse 23
text: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit.

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 1
text: Paul, an Apostle of Jesus Christ, by the purpose of God, and Timothy our brother,

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 2
text: To the saints and true brothers in Christ at Colossae: Grace to you and peace from God our Father.

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 3
text: We give praise to God the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, making prayer for you at all times,

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 4
text: After hearing of your faith in Christ Jesus, and of the love which you have for all the saints,

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 5
text: Through the hope which is in store for you in heaven; knowledge of which was given to you before in the true word of the good news,

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 6
text: Which has come to you; and which in all the world is giving fruit and increase, as it has done in you from the day when it came to your ears and you had true knowledge of the grace of God;

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 7
text: As it was given to you by Epaphras, our well-loved helper, who is a true servant of Christ for us,

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 8
text: And who, himself, made clear to us your love in the Spirit.

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 9
text: For this reason, we, from the day when we had word of it, keep on in prayer for you, that you may be full of the knowledge of his purpose, with all wisdom and experience of the Spirit,

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 10
text: Living uprightly in the approval of the Lord, giving fruit in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God;

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 11
text: Full of strength in the measure of the great power of his glory, so that you may undergo all troubles with joy;

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 12
text: Giving praise to the Father who has given us a part in the heritage of the saints in light;

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 13
text: Who has made us free from the power of evil and given us a place in the kingdom of the Son of his love;

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 14
text: In whom we have our salvation, the forgiveness of sins:

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 15
text: Who is the image of the unseen God coming into existence before all living things;

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 16
text: For by him all things were made, in heaven and on earth, things seen and things unseen, authorities, lords, rulers, and powers; all things were made by him and for him;

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 17
text: He is before all things, and in him all things have being.

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 18
text: And he is the head of the body, the church: the starting point of all things, the first to come again from the dead; so that in all things he might have the chief place.

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 19
text: For God in full measure was pleased to be in him;

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 20
text: Through him uniting all things with himself, having made peace through the blood of his cross; through him, I say, uniting all things which are on earth or in heaven.

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 21
text: And you, who in the past were cut off and at war with God in your minds through evil works, he has now made one

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 22
text: In the body of his flesh through death, so that you might be holy and without sin and free from all evil before him:

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 23
text: If you keep yourselves safely based in the faith, not moved from the hope of the good news which came to you, and which was given to every living being under heaven; of which I, Paul, was made a servant.

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 24
text: Now I have joy in my pain because of you, and in my flesh I undergo whatever is still needed to make the sorrows of Christ complete, for the salvation of his body, the church;

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 25
text: Of which I became a servant by the purpose of God which was given to me for you, to give effect to the word of God,

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 26
text: The secret which has been kept from all times and generations, but has now been made clear to his saints,

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 27
text: To whom God was pleased to give knowledge of the wealth of the glory of this secret among the Gentiles, which is Christ in you, the hope of glory:

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 28
text: Whom we are preaching; guiding and teaching every man in all wisdom, so that every man may be complete in Christ;

title: Colossians Chapter 1 Verse 29
text: And for this purpose I am working, using all my strength by the help of his power which is working in me strongly.

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 1
text: For it is my desire to give you news of the great fight I am making for you and for those at Laodicea, and for all who have not seen my face in the flesh;

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 2
text: So that their hearts may be comforted, and that being joined together in love, they may come to the full wealth of the certain knowledge of the secret of God, even Christ,

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 3
text: In whom are all the secret stores of wisdom and knowledge.

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 4
text: I say this so that you may not be turned away by any deceit of words.

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 5
text: For though I am not present in the flesh, still I am with you in the spirit, seeing with joy your order, and your unchanging faith in Christ.

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 6
text: As, then, you took Christ Jesus the Lord, so go on in him,

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 7
text: Rooted and based together in him, strong in the faith which the teaching gave you, giving praise to God at all times.

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 8
text: Take care that no one takes you away by force, through man's wisdom and deceit, going after the beliefs of men and the theories of the world, and not after Christ:

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 9
text: For in him all the wealth of God's being has a living form,

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 10
text: And you are complete in him, who is the head of all rule and authority:

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 11
text: In whom you had a circumcision not made with hands, in the putting off of the body of the flesh, in the circumcision of Christ;

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 12
text: Having been put to death with him in baptism, by which you came to life again with him, through faith in the working of God, who made him come back from the dead.

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 13
text: And you, being dead through your sins and the evil condition of your flesh, to you, I say, he gave life together with him, and forgiveness of all our sins;

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 14
text: Having put an end to the handwriting of the law which was against us, taking it out of the way by nailing it to his cross;

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 15
text: Having made himself free from the rule of authorities and powers, he put them openly to shame, glorying over them in it.

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 16
text: For this reason let no man be your judge in any question of food or drink or feast days or new moons or Sabbaths:

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 17
text: For these are an image of the things which are to come; but the body is Christ's.

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 18
text: Let no man take your reward from you by consciously making little of himself and giving worship to angels; having his thoughts fixed on the things which he has seen, being foolishly lifted up in his natural mind,

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 19
text: And not joined to the Head, from whom all the body, being given strength and kept together through its joins and bands, has its growth with the increase of God.

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 20
text: If you were made free, by your death with Christ, from the rules of the world, why do you put yourselves under the authority of orders

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 21
text: Which say there may be no touching, tasting, or taking in your hands,

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 22
text: (Rules which are all to come to an end with their use) after the orders and teaching of men?

title: Colossians Chapter 2 Verse 23
text: These things seem to have a sort of wisdom in self-ordered worship and making little of oneself, and being cruel to the body, not honouring it by giving it its natural use.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 1
text: If then you have a new life with Christ, give your attention to the things of heaven, where Christ is seated at the right hand of God.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 2
text: Keep your mind on the higher things, not on the things of earth.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 3
text: For your life on earth is done, and you have a secret life with Christ in God.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 4
text: At the coming of Christ who is our life, you will be seen with him in glory.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 5
text: Then put to death your bodies which are of the earth; wrong use of the flesh, unclean things, passion, evil desires and envy, which is the worship of strange gods;

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 6
text: Because of which the wrath of God comes on those who go against his orders;

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 7
text: Among whom you were living in the past, when you did such things.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 8
text: But now it is right for you to put away all these things; wrath, passion, bad feeling, curses, unclean talk;

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 9
text: Do not make false statements to one another; because you have put away the old man with all his doings,

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 10
text: And have put on the new man, which has become new in knowledge after the image of his maker;

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 11
text: Where there is no Greek or Jew, no one with circumcision or without circumcision, no division between nations, no servant or free man: but Christ is all and in all.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 12
text: As saints of God, then, holy and dearly loved, let your behaviour be marked by pity and mercy, kind feeling, a low opinion of yourselves, gentle ways, and a power of undergoing all things;

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 13
text: Being gentle to one another and having forgiveness for one another, if anyone has done wrong to his brother, even as the Lord had forgiveness for you:

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 14
text: And more than all, have love; the only way in which you may be completely joined together.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 15
text: And let the peace of Christ be ruling in your hearts, as it was the purpose of God for you to be one body; and give praise to God at all times.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 16
text: Let the word of Christ be in you in all wealth of wisdom; teaching and helping one another with songs of praise and holy words, making melody to God with grace in your hearts.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 17
text: And whatever you do, in word or in act, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving praise to God the Father through him.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 18
text: Wives, be under the authority of your husbands, as is right in the Lord.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 19
text: Husbands, have love for your wives, and be not bitter against them.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 20
text: Children, do the orders of your fathers and mothers in all things, for this is pleasing to the Lord.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 21
text: Fathers, do not be hard on your children, so that their spirit may not be broken.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 22
text: Servants, in all things do the orders of your natural masters; not only when their eyes are on you, as pleasers of men, but with all your heart, fearing the Lord:

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 23
text: Whatever you do, do it readily, as to the Lord and not to men;

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 24
text: Being certain that the Lord will give you the reward of the heritage: for you are the servants of the Lord Christ.

title: Colossians Chapter 3 Verse 25
text: For the wrongdoer will have punishment for the wrong he has done, without respect for any man's position.

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 1
text: Masters, give your servants what is right and equal, conscious that you have a Master in heaven.

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 2
text: Give yourselves to prayer at all times, keeping watch with praise;

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 3
text: And making prayer for us, that God may give us an open door for the preaching of the word, the secret of Christ, for which I am now in chains;

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 4
text: So that I may make it clear, as it is right for me to do.

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 5
text: Be wise in your behaviour to those who are outside, making good use of the time.

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 6
text: Let your talk be with grace, mixed with salt, so that you may be able to give an answer to everyone.

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 7
text: Tychicus will give you news of all my business: he is a dear brother and true servant and helper in the word;

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 8
text: And I have sent him to you for this very purpose, so that you may have news of how we are, and so that he may give your hearts comfort;

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 9
text: And with him I have sent Onesimus, the true and well-loved brother, who is one of you. They will give you word of everything which is taking place here.

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 10
text: Aristarchus, my brother-prisoner, sends his love to you, and Mark, a relation of Barnabas (about whom you have been given orders: if he comes to you, be kind to him),

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 11
text: And Jesus, whose other name is Justus; these are of the circumcision: they are my only brother-workers for the kingdom of God, who have been a comfort to me.

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 12
text: Epaphras, who is one of you, a servant of Christ Jesus, sends you his love, ever taking thought for you in his prayers, that you may be complete and fully certain of all the purpose of God.

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 13
text: For I give witness of him that he has undergone much trouble for you and for those in Laodicea and in Hierapolis.

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 14
text: Luke, our well-loved medical friend, and Demas, send you their love.

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 15
text: Give my love to the brothers in Laodicea and to Nymphas and the church in their house.

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 16
text: And when this letter has been made public among you, let the same be done in the church of Laodicea; and see that you have the letter from Laodicea.

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 17
text: Say to Archippus, See that you do the work which the Lord has given you to do.

title: Colossians Chapter 4 Verse 18
text: I, Paul, give you this word of love in my handwriting. Keep in memory that I am a prisoner. Grace be with you.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 1 Verse 1
text: Paul and Silvanus and Timothy, to the church of the Thessalonians in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace to you and peace.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 1 Verse 2
text: We give praise to God at all times for you, keeping you in memory in our prayers;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 1 Verse 3
text: Having ever in mind your work of faith and acts of love and the strength of your hope in our Lord Jesus Christ, before our God and Father;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 1 Verse 4
text: Being conscious, my brothers, dear to God, that you have been marked out by God's purpose;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 1 Verse 5
text: Because our good news came to you, not in word only, but in power, and in the Holy Spirit, so that you were completely certain of it; even as you saw what our behaviour to you was like from our love to you.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 1 Verse 6
text: And you took us and the Lord as your example, after the word had come to you in much trouble, with joy in the Holy Spirit;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 1 Verse 7
text: So that you became an example to all those who have faith in Christ in Macedonia and Achaia.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 1 Verse 8
text: For not only was the word of the Lord sounding out from you in Macedonia and Achaia, but in every place your faith in God is made clear; so that we have no need to say anything.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 1 Verse 9
text: For they themselves give the news of how we came among you; and how you were turned from images to God, to the worship of a true and living God,

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 1 Verse 10
text: Waiting for his Son from heaven, who came back from the dead, even Jesus, our Saviour from the wrath to come.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 1
text: For you yourselves, brothers, are conscious that our coming among you was not without effect:

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 2
text: But after we had first undergone much pain and been cruelly attacked as you saw, at Philippi, by the help of God we gave you the good news without fear, though everything was against us.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 3
text: For our witness does not come from error or from an unclean heart or from deceit:

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 4
text: But even as the good news was given to us by the approval of God, so we give it out; not as pleasing men, but God by whom our hearts are tested.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 5
text: For it is common knowledge among you that we never made use of smooth-sounding false words, and God is witness that at no time were we secretly desiring profit for ourselves,

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 6
text: Or looking for glory from men, from you or from others, when we might have made ourselves a care to you as Apostles of Christ.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 7
text: But we were gentle among you, like a woman caring for her little ones:

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 8
text: Even so, being full of loving desire for you, we took delight in giving you not only God's good news, but even our lives, because you were dear to us.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 9
text: For you have the memory, my brothers, of our trouble and care; how, working night and day, so that we might not be a trouble to any of you, we gave you the good news of God.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 10
text: You are witnesses, with God, how holy and upright and free from all evil was our way of life among you who have faith;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 11
text: Even as you saw how, like a father with his children, we were teaching and comforting you all, and giving witness,

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 12
text: So that your lives might be pleasing to God, who has given you a part in his kingdom and his glory.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 13
text: And for this cause we still give praise to God, that, when the word came to your ears through us, you took it, not as the word of man, but, as it truly is, the word of God, which has living power in you who have faith.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 14
text: For you, my brothers, took as your examples the churches of God which are in Judaea in Christ Jesus; because you underwent the same things from your countrymen as they did from the Jews;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 15
text: Who put to death the Lord Jesus and the prophets, violently driving us out; who are unpleasing to God and against all men;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 16
text: Who, to make the measure of their sins complete, kept us from giving the word of salvation to the Gentiles: but the wrath of God is about to come on them in the fullest degree.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 17
text: But we, my brothers, being away from you for a short time, in body but not in heart, had all the more desire to see your face;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 18
text: For which reason we made attempts to come to you, even I, Paul, once and again; but Satan kept us from coming.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 19
text: For what is our hope or joy or crown of glory? Are not even you, before our Lord Jesus, at his coming?

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 2 Verse 20
text: For you are our glory and our joy.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 3 Verse 1
text: At last our desire to have news of you was so strong that, while we ourselves were waiting at Athens,

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 3 Verse 2
text: We sent Timothy, our brother and God's servant in the good news of Christ, to give you strength and comfort in your faith;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 3 Verse 3
text: So that no man might be moved by these troubles; because you see that these things are part of God's purpose for us.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 3 Verse 4
text: And when we were with you, we said to you that trouble was before us; and so it came about, as you see.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 3 Verse 5
text: For this reason, when I was no longer able to keep quiet, I sent to get news of your faith, fearing that you might be tested by the Evil One and that our work might come to nothing.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 3 Verse 6
text: But now that Timothy has come to us from you, and has given us good news of your faith and love, and that you have happy memories of us, desiring greatly to see us, even as we do to see you;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 3 Verse 7
text: For this cause, brothers, in all our trouble and grief we were comforted about you because of your faith;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 3 Verse 8
text: For it is life to us if you keep your faith in the Lord unchanged.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 3 Verse 9
text: For how great is the praise which we give to God for you, and how great the joy with which we are glad because of you before our God;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 3 Verse 10
text: Night and day requesting God again and again that we may see your face and make your faith complete.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 3 Verse 11
text: Now may our God and Father himself and our Lord Jesus make a way for us to come to you;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 3 Verse 12
text: And the Lord give you increase of love in fullest measure to one another and to all men, even as our love to you;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 3 Verse 13
text: So that your hearts may be strong and free from all sin before our God and Father, at the coming of our Lord Jesus with all his saints.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 1
text: And last of all, the prayer which we make to you from our heart and in the name of the Lord Jesus, is this: that as we made clear to you what sort of behaviour is pleasing to God, as in fact you are doing now, so you will go on in these ways, but more and more.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 2
text: Because you have in mind the orders we gave you through the Lord Jesus.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 3
text: For the purpose of God for you is this: that you may be holy, and may keep yourselves from the desires of the flesh;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 4
text: So that every one of you may keep his body holy and in honour;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 5
text: Not in the passion of evil desires, like the Gentiles, who have no knowledge of God;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 6
text: And that no man may make attempts to get the better of his brother in business: for the Lord is the judge in all these things, as we said to you before and gave witness.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 7
text: Because it is God's purpose that our way of life may be not unclean but holy.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 8
text: Whoever, then, goes against this word, goes against not man but God, who gives his Holy Spirit to you.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 9
text: But about loving the brothers, there is no need for me to say anything to you in this letter: for you have the teaching of God that love for one another is right and necessary;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 10
text: And, truly, you are lovers of all the brothers in Macedonia; but it is our desire that your love may be increased still more;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 11
text: And that you may take pride in being quiet and doing your business, working with your hands as we gave you orders;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 12
text: That you may be respected by those who are outside, and may have need of nothing.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 13
text: But it is our desire, brothers, that you may be certain about those who are sleeping; so that you may have no need for sorrow, as others have who are without hope.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 14
text: For if we have faith that Jesus underwent death and came back again, even so those who are sleeping will come again with him by God's power.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 15
text: For this we say to you by the word of the Lord, that we who are still living at the coming of the Lord, will not go before those who are sleeping.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 16
text: Because the Lord himself will come down from heaven with a word of authority, with the voice of the chief angel, with the sound of a horn: and the dead in Christ will come to life first;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 17
text: Then we who are still living will be taken up together with them into the clouds to see the Lord in the air: and so will we be for ever with the Lord.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 4 Verse 18
text: So then, give comfort to one another with these words.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 5 Verse 1
text: But about the times and their order, my brothers, there is no need for me to say anything to you.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 5 Verse 2
text: For you yourselves have the knowledge that the day of the Lord will come like a thief in the night.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 5 Verse 3
text: When they say, There is peace and no danger, then sudden destruction will come on them, as birth-pains on a woman with child; and they will not be able to get away from it.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 5 Verse 4
text: But you, my brothers, are not in the dark, for that day to overtake you like a thief:

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 5 Verse 5
text: For you are all sons of light and of the day: we are not of the night or of the dark.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 5 Verse 6
text: So then, let us not take our rest as the others do, but let us be self-controlled and awake.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 5 Verse 7
text: For those who are sleeping do so in the night; and those who are the worse for drink are so in the night;

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 5 Verse 8
text: But let us, who are of the day, be serious, putting on the breastplate of faith and love, and on our heads, the hope of salvation.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 5 Verse 9
text: For God's purpose for us is not wrath, but salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ,

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 5 Verse 10
text: Who was put to death for us, so that, awake or sleeping, we may have a part in his life.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 5 Verse 11
text: So then, go on comforting and building up one another, as you have been doing.

title: 1 Thessalonians Chapter 5 Verse 12
